html:
(8) The highways lie waste . . .—Another feature in the picture of terror. No traveller dared to show himself in the main road. (Comp.Judges 5:6 .)

He hath broken.—Sennacherib is denounced as having broken the treaty of2 Kings 18:14 . Hezekiah had complied with his conditions, and yet there was no suspension of hostilities.
